LanguageData.GrandioseBestowingCeremony.stages.grandi: The bestowing ceremony was like a taste of true grandeur, and a moment of participation in something greater.
LanguageData.HonorableBestowingCeremony.stages.honora: The bestowing ceremony brought a sense of dignity and honor to the participants.
LanguageData.TerribleBestowingCeremony.stages.terribl: The bestowing ceremony somehow felt petty and self-indulgent at the same time.
LanguageData.UnimpressiveBestowingCeremony.stages.uni: The bestowing ceremony felt mechanical and lifeless.
